Collection: design-intelligence

The design-intelligence collection is positioned as a comprehensive design-focused capability pack: profiles, agents, and context specialized for design work.

What you get

  • A turnkey design-oriented profile (commonly referenced as designer)
  • Specialized agents (often prefixed like design-intelligence:...)
  • Context and conventions tuned for design systems and design intelligence tasks

How it tends to be used

  • Design system audits and improvements
  • UI/UX planning and critique
  • Design-to-implementation collaboration (bridging design intent to code changes)

Install and try

amplifier collection add git+https://github.com/microsoft/amplifier-collection-design-intelligence@main
amplifier profile use designer
